title: girijaadEviya
sahitya:
girijAdEviya bhajiselO manujA mareyadE ninnanu dinavu





anupallavi



 paripari janumata durita vagaLevE paramAnandava paduLadE paDEyuvE



caraNam

 dharaNipa nAguvE suravara nAguvE vara bhakta shirOmaNi nI nAguvE

 harikEshana caraNava nODuvE niratavu mOkSada nelayali niluvE
